(C) 2014 Team CoFH / CoFH / Cult of the Full Hub http://www.teamcofh.com

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AugmentHelper  
    BlockHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with Block and Block-related manipulation and interaction.
    BlockHelper.RotationType  
    ColorHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with colors.
    DamageHelper
    This class contains helper functions related to Damage types that CoFH mods add.
    DamageHelper.DamageSourceCryotheum  
    DamageHelper.DamageSourceFlux  
    DamageHelper.DamageSourceMana  
    DamageHelper.DamageSourcePetrotheum  
    DamageHelper.DamageSourcePyrotheum  
    DamageHelper.EntityDamageSourceFlux  
    EnergyHelper
    This class contains helper functions related to Redstone Flux, the basis of the CoFH Energy System.
    EntityHelper
    This class contains various helper functions related to Entities.
    FireworksHelper
    Contains helper functions to assist with working with fireworks.
    FireworksHelper.Explosion
    Represents a single explosion that a firework rocket can contain.
    FluidHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with Fluid and Fluid-related manipulation and interaction.
    HolidayHelper
    The class contains helper functions related to Holidays!
    InventoryHelper
    This class contains helper functions related to Inventories and Inventory manipulation.
    ItemHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with Item and ItemStack manipulation and interaction.
    MathHelper
    Contains various math-related helper functions.
    NBTHelper
    Contains helper functions for the NBTTagCompound on an ItemStack
    RedstoneControlHelper  
    SecurityHelper  
    ServerHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with determining Server/Client status.
    SoundHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with Sound manipulation.
    StringHelper
    Contains various helper functions to assist with String manipulation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FireworksHelper.Explosion.Type
    The different shapes that an explosion can have.
